Characteristic.name: CGM Session Run Time

Field.name: CGM Session Run Time
Field.InformativeText: Typically the CGM Sensors have a limited run time where they are approved for by regulatory bodies. However this characteristic should enable a prediction of the run time depending on physiological effects in future devices.

Field.name: E2E-CRC
Field.InformativeText: If the device supports E2E-safety (E2E-CRC-Supported bit is set in CGM Feature), the session run time is secured by a CRC calculated over all fields.

Characteristic.Note: C1: Mandatory if device supports E2E-CRC (Bit 12 is set in CGM Feature) otherwise excluded. The fields in the above table are in the order of LSO to MSO. Where LSO = Least Significant Octet and MSO = Most Significant Octet
